texts.name: Pauline
texts.biography: Pauline's long purplr hair and a pair of amethyst eyes are the symbol of a noble girl. However, Pauline prefer to learning archery instead of being a nobility. The amethyst girl used to live in Bracada, she started to go to the enigma place and search for her own livelihood after she had felt psychic power.
